mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ferdinand Lewis Alcindor, Jr., talented basketball player for the University of California, Los Angeles Bruins, stars in a commercial produced by the Wheaties Sports Federation
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ferdinand Lewis Alcindor, Jr., of the University of California, Los Angeles Bruins, is the most overpowering basketball player in over a decade. The National Association of College Basketball Coaches selected Alcindor to be a part of the All American 1968 Team. Footage shows Alcindor playing basketball for the Bruins in a commercial produced by the Wheaties Sports Federation. With his college career coming to a close, Alcindor says his upcoming plans include a trip to the West Indies.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Basketball
Wheaties Sports Federation
